column4: Hello, all.  I'm trying to use NoMachine's NX client to connect to Hardy and share a local printer however it gives an error: lpadmin Bad device-uri nx://<name>.  nx is in /usr/lib/cups/backend.  Any idea why this doesn't work on Hardy while it does work on other distros?
Hi, tempest.  I've got the same problem.  It appears to be a problem with the fglrx driver for my ATI card.  Is that what you are using?
i found several fixes for the ati but none for nvidia.  It worked until i had to switch to legacy drivers
